iMessage.doc:
Sends an iMessage

Parameters:
 * targetAddress - A string containing a phone number or email address registered with iMessage, to send the iMessage to
 * message - A string containing the message to send

Returns:
 * None
iMessage.name: iMessage
parameters: * targetAddress - A string containing a phone number or email address registered with iMessage, to send the iMessage to
* message - A string containing the message to send

SMS.desc: Sends an SMS using SMS Relay
SMS.doc:
Sends an SMS using SMS Relay

Parameters:
 * targetNumber - A string containing a phone number to send an SMS to
 * message - A string containing the message to send

Returns:
 * None
SMS.name: SMS
parameters: * targetNumber - A string containing a phone number to send an SMS to
* message - A string containing the message to send
